title: Run League as admin on Mac OSX
body:
So I want to connect my LoL to my Discord, and in order to do that (apparently) I have to run both as administrator. Unfortunately, after sifting through the web I could only find guides on how to do it on Windows, which is impossible because I'm a Mac OSX user and I don't get those sort of popups. I tried right clicking but all I got was stuff like "Open", "Remove from dock", etc.
Any help is appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body: Here's a handy guide on getting those Mac Admin rights setup ^_^ ->[** Click Here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9)
